schema.name: Vehicle Sales: Mnemonic - Vehicle/Country or MCODE
Vehicle Sales: Sales Parent or GROUP
Vehicle Sales: Car/Truck or MACRO LEVEL SEGMENT
Vehicle Sales: Regional Sub-Segment or MODIFIED SEGMENT
Regional Segment  Concat or DRI SEGMENT
SOS Year or NALV MODEL NAME
Vehicle Sales: Body Type or BODYSTYLE
AS / SUM / WIN / LRR  APPLIES TO OEM MARKETING

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	foldernamedf as string,
	filenamedf as string
}
source(output(
		Make as string,
		Model as string,
		Type as string,
		Origin as string,
		DriveTrain as string,
		Length as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	moveFiles: [(concat($foldernamedf,'/', $filenamedf)),(concat('outputs/',substring($filenamedf, 1,add(instr($filenamedf, '.'),-1)),'_',replace(replace(replace(toString(currentTimestamp()),':','_'),' ','_'),'-','_'),'_','.txt')


)]) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		{SALE COUNTRY} as string,
		VEH_SOURCE as string,
		{IMPORT / DOMESTIC} as string,
		{Mnemonic Only} as string,
		{Vehicle Sales: Mnemonic - Vehicle/Country or MCODE} as string,
		TCODE as short,
		{Vehicle Sales: Sales Parent or GROUP} as string,
		{Vehicle Sales: Car/Truck or MACRO LEVEL SEGMENT} as string,
		{Vehicle Sales: Regional Sub-Segment or MODIFIED SEGMENT} as string,
		{Regional Segment  Concat or DRI SEGMENT} as string,
		{Vehicle Sales: Platform} as string,
		{Vehicle Sales: Brand} as string,
		{SOS Year or NALV MODEL NAME} as string,
		{Vehicle Sales: Nameplate or MODEL} as string,
		TRIM as string,
		Electric as string,
		{Vehicle Sales: Body Type or BODYSTYLE} as string,
		DOORS as short,
		DRIVETYPE as string,
		{LAST UPDATE} as date,
		SERIES as string,
		TYPE_F as string,
		{SECTION WIDTH} as short,
		{ASPECT RATIO} as double,
		{TYPE CONSTRUCTION} as string,
		{RIM DIAMETER} as short,
		{LOAD INDEX} as string,
		{SPEED SYMBOL} as string,
		{Previous Speed Symbol 0520} as string,
		FRONT_SIZE as string,
		CORE_F_SIZE as string,
		{CHECK INFO F TO B} as string,
		TYPE_R as string,
		{REAR SECTION WIDTH} as short,
		{REAR ASPECT RATIO} as double,
		{REAR TYPE CONSTRUCTION} as string,
		{REAR RIM DIAMETER} as short,
		{REAR LOAD INDEX} as string,
		{REAR SPEED SYMBOL} as string,
		REAR_SIZE as string,
		CORE_R_SIZE as string,
		{NEW SIZE AFTER 2015 / YEAR ADDED (FRT)} as string,
		{TIRE PARENT} as string,
		TIRE_BRAND as string,
		TIRE_MODEL as string,
		{Previous TIRE BRAND 0520} as string,
		{Previous TIRE MODEL 0520} as string,
		{Tire Category} as short,
		{Vehicle App} as short,
		Segment as string,
		{Reporting Segment} as string,
		{Tire Designation} as string,
		{Core 4} as string,
		{AS / SUM / WIN / LRR  APPLIES TO OEM MARKETING} as string,
		SIDEWALL as string,
		{WHEEL TYPE} as string,
		{RUN_FLAT DETAIL  (INTERNAL TO TIRE)} as string,
		PRES_MON as string,
		MON_SUPP as string,
		{SPARE DETAIL  (EXTERNAL TO TIRE)} as string,
		{1998_VVOL} as double,
		{1999_VVOL} as double,
		{2000_VVOL} as double,
		{2001_VVOL} as double,
		{2002_VVOL} as double,
		{2003_VVOL} as double,
		{2004_VVOL} as double,
		{2005_VVOL} as double,
		{2006_VVOL} as double,
		{2007_VVOL} as double,
		{2008_VVOL} as double,
		{2009_VVOL} as double,
		{2010_VVOL} as double,
		{2011_VVOL} as double,
		{2012_VVOL} as double,
		{2013_VVOL} as double,
		{2014_VVOL} as double,
		{2015_VVOL} as double,
		{2016_VVOL} as double,
		{2017_VVOL} as double,
		{2018_VVOL} as double,
		{2019_VVOL} as double,
		{2020_VVOL} as double,
		{2021_VVOL} as double,
		{2022_VVOL} as double,
		{2023_VVOL} as double,
		{2024_VVOL} as double,
		{2025_VVOL} as double,
		{1998_TVOL} as double,
		{1999_TVOL} as double,
		{2000_TVOL} as double,
		{2001_TVOL} as double,
		{2002_TVOL} as double,
		{2003_TVOL} as double,
		{2004_TVOL} as double,
		{2005_TVOL} as double,
		{2006_TVOL} as double,
		{2007_TVOL} as double,
		{2008_TVOL} as double,
		{2009_TVOL} as double,
		{2010_TVOL} as double,
		{2011_TVOL} as double,
		{2012_TVOL} as double,
		{2013_TVOL} as double,
		{2014_TVOL} as double,
		{2015_TVOL} as double,
		{2016_TVOL} as double,
		{2017_TVOL} as double,
		{2018_TVOL} as double,
		{2019_TVOL} as double,
		{2020_TVOL} as double,
		{2021_TVOL} as double,
		{2022_TVOL} as double,
		{2023_TVOL} as double,
		{2024_TVOL} as double,
		{2025_TVOL} as double,
		{Updated Segment} as string,
		{Updated Bodytype} as string,
		{Vehicle Sales: Regional Segment} as string,
		{Vehicle Sales: Regional Price Class} as string,
		{Global Sales Segment} as string,
		{Global Sales Sub-segment} as string,
		{Global Sales Price Class} as string,
		{Vehicle Sales: Program} as string,
		{RUN_FLAT SIMPL} as string,
		{SPARE TIRE SIMPL} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source11
source(output(
		OE_Tire_Size as string,
		Load_Range as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> loadrange
source(output(
		Original_Size as string,
		Corrected_Size as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> sizecor
source(output(
		Original_Speed_Rating as string,
		New_Speed_Rating as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> speed
source11 select(mapColumn(
		{Vehicle Sale Country} = {SALE COUNTRY},
		{Vehicle Source Country} = VEH_SOURCE,
		{Vehicle Source Classification} = {IMPORT / DOMESTIC},
		{Markit code} = {Mnemonic Only},
		MCODE = {Vehicle Sales: Mnemonic - Vehicle/Country or MCODE},
		TCODE,
		{Vehicle Sales Parent} = {Vehicle Sales: Sales Parent or GROUP},
		{Vehicle Macro Segment} = {Vehicle Sales: Car/Truck or MACRO LEVEL SEGMENT},
		{Vehicle Sub-segment} = {Vehicle Sales: Regional Sub-Segment or MODIFIED SEGMENT},
		{Vehicle Micro Segment} = {Regional Segment  Concat or DRI SEGMENT},
		{Vehicle Platform} = {Vehicle Sales: Platform},
		{Vehicle Brand} = {Vehicle Sales: Brand},
		{Vehicle Model} = {Vehicle Sales: Nameplate or MODEL},
		{Vehicle Trim} = TRIM,
		{Vehicle Electric Indicator} = Electric,
		{Vehicle Body Style} = {Vehicle Sales: Body Type or BODYSTYLE},
		{Vehicle Number of Doors} = DOORS,
		{Vehicle Drive Type} = DRIVETYPE,
		{Vehicle Last Update} = {LAST UPDATE},
		{Vehicle Series} = SERIES,
		{Front Tire Prefix} = TYPE_F,
		{Front Tire Section Width} = {SECTION WIDTH},
		{Front Tire Aspect Ratio} = {ASPECT RATIO},
		{Front Tire Construction} = {TYPE CONSTRUCTION},
		{Front Tire Rim Diameter} = {RIM DIAMETER},
		{Front Tire Load Index} = {LOAD INDEX},
		{Front Tire Speed Rating} = {SPEED SYMBOL},
		{Total Front Size} = FRONT_SIZE,
		{Front Size} = CORE_F_SIZE,
		{Front vs Rear Tire Different} = {CHECK INFO F TO B},
		{Rear Tire Prefix} = TYPE_R,
		{Rear Tire Section Width} = {REAR SECTION WIDTH},
		{Rear Tire Aspect Ratio} = {REAR ASPECT RATIO},
		{Rear Tire Construction} = {REAR TYPE CONSTRUCTION},
		{Rear Tire Rim Diameter} = {REAR RIM DIAMETER},
		{Rear Load Index} = {REAR LOAD INDEX},
		{Rear Speed Rating} = {REAR SPEED SYMBOL},
		{Total Rear Size} = REAR_SIZE,
		{Rear Size} = CORE_R_SIZE,
		{Tire Parent} = {TIRE PARENT},
		{Tire Brand} = TIRE_BRAND,
		{Tire Model} = TIRE_MODEL,
		{RMA Tire Category} = {Tire Category},
		{RMA Vehicle App} = {Vehicle App},
		{RMA Segment} = Segment,
		{Reporting Segment},
		{Tire Designation},
		{Tire Application} = {AS / SUM / WIN / LRR  APPLIES TO OEM MARKETING},
		{Tire Sidewall} = SIDEWALL,
		{Wheel Type} = {WHEEL TYPE},
		{Tire Run Flat Technology} = {RUN_FLAT DETAIL  (INTERNAL TO TIRE)},
		{Tire Pressure Monitoring} = PRES_MON,
		{Supplier of Tire Pressure Monitoring} = MON_SUPP,
		{Spare Detail} = {SPARE DETAIL  (EXTERNAL TO TIRE)},
		{1998_VVOL},
		{1999_VVOL},
		{2000_VVOL},
		{2001_VVOL},
		{2002_VVOL},
		{2003_VVOL},
		{2004_VVOL},
		{2005_VVOL},
		{2006_VVOL},
		{2007_VVOL},
		{2008_VVOL},
		{2009_VVOL},
		{2010_VVOL},
		{2011_VVOL},
		{2012_VVOL},
		{2013_VVOL},
		{2014_VVOL},
		{2015_VVOL},
		{2016_VVOL},
		{2017_VVOL},
		{2018_VVOL},
		{2019_VVOL},
		{2020_VVOL},
		{2021_VVOL},
		{2022_VVOL},
		{2023_VVOL},
		{2024_VVOL},
		{2025_VVOL},
		{1998_TVOL},
		{1999_TVOL},
		{2000_TVOL},
		{2001_TVOL},
		{2002_TVOL},
		{2003_TVOL},
		{2004_TVOL},
		{2005_TVOL},
		{2006_TVOL},
		{2007_TVOL},
		{2008_TVOL},
		{2009_TVOL},
		{2010_TVOL},
		{2011_TVOL},
		{2012_TVOL},
		{2013_TVOL},
		{2014_TVOL},
		{2015_TVOL},
		{2016_TVOL},
		{2017_TVOL},
		{2018_TVOL},
		{2019_TVOL},
		{2020_TVOL},
		{2021_TVOL},
		{2022_TVOL},
		{2023_TVOL},
		{2024_TVOL},
		{2025_TVOL},
		{Vehicle Updated Segment} = {Updated Segment},
		{Vehicle Updated Bodytype} = {Updated Bodytype},
		{Vehicle Regional Segment} = {Vehicle Sales: Regional Segment},
		{Vehicle Regional Price Class} = {Vehicle Sales: Regional Price Class},
		{Vehicle Global Segment} = {Global Sales Segment},
		{Vehicle Global Subsegment} = {Global Sales Sub-segment},
		{Vehicle Global Price Class} = {Global Sales Price Class},
		{Vehicle Program} = {Vehicle Sales: Program},
		{Simple Run Flat Detail} = {RUN_FLAT SIMPL},
		{Simple Spare Detail} = {SPARE TIRE SIMPL}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 unpivot(output(
		Name as string,
		Value as double
	),
	ungroupBy({Vehicle Sale Country},
		{Vehicle Source Country},
		{Vehicle Source Classification},
		{Markit code},
		MCODE,
		TCODE,
		{Vehicle Sales Parent},
		{Vehicle Macro Segment},
		{Vehicle Sub-segment},
		{Vehicle Micro Segment},
		{Vehicle Platform},
		{Vehicle Brand},
		{Vehicle Model},
		{Vehicle Trim},
		{Vehicle Electric Indicator},
		{Vehicle Body Style},
		{Vehicle Number of Doors},
		{Vehicle Drive Type},
		{Vehicle Last Update},
		{Vehicle Series},
		{Front Tire Prefix},
		{Front Tire Section Width},
		{Front Tire Aspect Ratio},
		{Front Tire Construction},
		{Front Tire Rim Diameter},
		{Front Tire Load Index},
		{Front Tire Speed Rating},
		{Total Front Size},
		{Front Size},
		{Front vs Rear Tire Different},
		{Rear Tire Prefix},
		{Rear Tire Section Width},
		{Rear Tire Aspect Ratio},
		{Rear Tire Construction},
		{Rear Tire Rim Diameter},
		{Rear Load Index},
		{Rear Speed Rating},
		{Total Rear Size},
		{Rear Size},
		{Tire Parent},
		{Tire Brand},
		{Tire Model},
		{RMA Tire Category},
		{RMA Vehicle App},
		{RMA Segment},
		{Reporting Segment},
		{Tire Designation},
		{Tire Application},
		{Tire Sidewall},
		{Wheel Type},
		{Tire Run Flat Technology},
		{Tire Pressure Monitoring},
		{Supplier of Tire Pressure Monitoring},
		{Spare Detail},
		{Vehicle Updated Segment},
		{Vehicle Updated Bodytype},
		{Vehicle Regional Segment},
		{Vehicle Regional Price Class},
		{Vehicle Global Segment},
		{Vehicle Global Subsegment},
		{Vehicle Global Price Class},
		{Vehicle Program},
		{Simple Run Flat Detail},
		{Simple Spare Detail}),
	lateral: false,
	ignoreNullPivots: false) ~> Unpivot1
Unpivot1 derive(Value = iif(toString(Value) == 'X', 0, toInteger(Value)),
		{Vehicle Model Year} = left(Name,4),
		{Volume Type} = upper(substring(Name,6,4)),
		{Tire Volume} = iif(upper(substring(Name,6,4)) == 'TVOL', toInteger(Value), 0),
		{Vehicle Sales Volume} = iif(upper(substring(Name,6,4)) == 'VVOL',toInteger(Value), 0),
		{Tire Designation} = iif({Tire Designation} == 'Light Truck', 'LT', iif({Tire Designation} == 'Passenger Car', 'PCR', {Tire Designation}))) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 aggregate(groupBy({Vehicle Sale Country},
		{Vehicle Source Country},
		{Vehicle Source Classification},
		{Markit code},
		MCODE,
		TCODE,
		{Vehicle Sales Parent},
		{Vehicle Macro Segment},
		{Vehicle Sub-segment},
		{Vehicle Micro Segment},
		{Vehicle Platform},
		{Vehicle Brand},
		{Vehicle Model},
		{Vehicle Trim},
		{Vehicle Electric Indicator},
		{Vehicle Body Style},
		{Vehicle Number of Doors},
		{Vehicle Drive Type},
		{Vehicle Last Update},
		{Vehicle Series},
		{Front Tire Prefix},
		{Front Tire Section Width},
		{Front Tire Aspect Ratio},
		{Front Tire Construction},
		{Front Tire Rim Diameter},
		{Front Tire Load Index},
		{Front Tire Speed Rating},
		{Total Front Size},
		{Front Size},
		{Front vs Rear Tire Different},
		{Rear Tire Prefix},
		{Rear Tire Section Width},
		{Rear Tire Aspect Ratio},
		{Rear Tire Construction},
		{Rear Tire Rim Diameter},
		{Rear Load Index},
		{Rear Speed Rating},
		{Total Rear Size},
		{Rear Size},
		{Tire Parent},
		{Tire Brand},
		{Tire Model},
		{RMA Tire Category},
		{RMA Vehicle App},
		{RMA Segment},
		{Reporting Segment},
		{Tire Designation},
		{Tire Application},
		{Tire Sidewall},
		{Wheel Type},
		{Tire Run Flat Technology},
		{Tire Pressure Monitoring},
		{Supplier of Tire Pressure Monitoring},
		{Spare Detail},
		{Vehicle Updated Segment},
		{Vehicle Updated Bodytype},
		{Vehicle Regional Segment},
		{Vehicle Regional Price Class},
		{Vehicle Global Segment},
		{Vehicle Global Subsegment},
		{Vehicle Global Price Class},
		{Vehicle Program},
		{Simple Run Flat Detail},
		{Simple Spare Detail},
		{Vehicle Model Year}),
	{Tire Volume} = sum({Tire Volume}),
		{Vehicle Sales Volume} = sum({Vehicle Sales Volume})) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 split(!({Tire Volume}==0&&{Vehicle Sales Volume}==0)&&{Simple Spare Detail}=='FULL',
	!({Tire Volume}==0&&{Vehicle Sales Volume}==0)&&{Simple Spare Detail}=='FULL',
	!({Tire Volume}==0&&{Vehicle Sales Volume}==0)&&{Simple Spare Detail}!='FULL',
	disjoint: true) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(FullSpare, FullSpare2, NoFullSpare)
ConditionalSplit1@FullSpare select(mapColumn(
		{Vehicle Sale Country},
		{Vehicle Source Country},
		{Vehicle Source Classification},
		{Markit code},
		MCODE,
		TCODE,
		{Vehicle Sales Parent},
		{Vehicle Macro Segment},
		{Vehicle Sub-segment},
		{Vehicle Micro Segment},
		{Vehicle Platform},
		{Vehicle Brand},
		{Vehicle Model},
		{Vehicle Trim},
		{Vehicle Electric Indicator},
		{Vehicle Body Style},
		{Vehicle Number of Doors},
		{Vehicle Drive Type},
		{Vehicle Last Update},
		{Vehicle Series},
		{Tire Prefix} = {Front Tire Prefix},
		{Tire Section Width} = {Front Tire Section Width},
		{Tire Aspect Ratio} = {Front Tire Aspect Ratio},
		{Tire Construction} = {Front Tire Construction},
		{Tire Rim Diameter} = {Front Tire Rim Diameter},
		{Tire Load Index} = {Front Tire Load Index},
		{Tire Speed Rating} = {Front Tire Speed Rating},
		{Tire Total Size} = {Total Front Size},
		{Tire Size} = {Front Size},
		{Front vs Rear Tire Different},
		{Tire Parent},
		{Tire Brand},
		{Tire Model},
		{RMA Tire Category},
		{RMA Vehicle App},
		{RMA Segment},
		{Reporting Segment},
		{Tire Designation},
		{Tire Application},
		{Tire Sidewall},
		{Wheel Type},
		{Tire Run Flat Technology},
		{Tire Pressure Monitoring},
		{Supplier of Tire Pressure Monitoring},
		{Spare Detail},
		{Vehicle Updated Segment},
		{Vehicle Updated Bodytype},
		{Vehicle Regional Segment},
		{Vehicle Regional Price Class},
		{Vehicle Global Segment},
		{Vehicle Global Subsegment},
		{Vehicle Global Price Class},
		{Vehicle Program},
		{Simple Run Flat Detail},
		{Simple Spare Detail},
		{Vehicle Model Year},
		{Tire Volume},
		{Vehicle Sales Volume}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select2 derive({Tire Volume} = {Vehicle Sales Volume},
		{Vehicle Sales Volume} = 0,
		{Tire Position} = "Full Spare") ~> DerivedColumn2
ConditionalSplit1@FullSpare2 derive({Tire Volume} = {Tire Volume}-{Vehicle Sales Volume}) ~> DerivedColumn3
ConditionalSplit1@NoFullSpare, DerivedColumn3 union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 split(ltrim(rtrim(trim({Front vs Rear Tire Different})))=='Y',
	ltrim(rtrim(trim({Front vs Rear Tire Different})))=='Y',
	disjoint: true) ~> ConditionalSplit2@(Samefrontreartyre, Samefrontreartyre2, noystream)
ConditionalSplit2@Samefrontreartyre select(mapColumn(
		{Vehicle Sale Country},
		{Vehicle Source Country},
		{Vehicle Source Classification},
		{Markit code},
		MCODE,
		TCODE,
		{Vehicle Sales Parent},
		{Vehicle Macro Segment},
		{Vehicle Sub-segment},
		{Vehicle Micro Segment},
		{Vehicle Platform},
		{Vehicle Brand},
		{Vehicle Model},
		{Vehicle Trim},
		{Vehicle Electric Indicator},
		{Vehicle Body Style},
		{Vehicle Number of Doors},
		{Vehicle Drive Type},
		{Vehicle Last Update},
		{Vehicle Series},
		{Tire Prefix} = {Front Tire Prefix},
		{Tire Section Width} = {Front Tire Section Width},
		{Tire Aspect Ratio} = {Front Tire Aspect Ratio},
		{Tire Construction} = {Front Tire Construction},
		{Tire Rim Diameter} = {Front Tire Rim Diameter},
		{Tire Load Index} = {Front Tire Load Index},
		{Tire Speed Rating} = {Front Tire Speed Rating},
		{Tire Total Size} = {Total Front Size},
		{Tire Size} = {Front Size},
		{Front vs Rear Tire Different},
		{Tire Parent},
		{Tire Brand},
		{Tire Model},
		{RMA Tire Category},
		{RMA Vehicle App},
		{RMA Segment},
		{Reporting Segment},
		{Tire Designation},
		{Tire Application},
		{Tire Sidewall},
		{Wheel Type},
		{Tire Run Flat Technology},
		{Tire Pressure Monitoring},
		{Supplier of Tire Pressure Monitoring},
		{Spare Detail},
		{Vehicle Updated Segment},
		{Vehicle Updated Bodytype},
		{Vehicle Regional Segment},
		{Vehicle Regional Price Class},
		{Vehicle Global Segment},
		{Vehicle Global Subsegment},
		{Vehicle Global Price Class},
		{Vehicle Program},
		{Simple Run Flat Detail},
		{Simple Spare Detail},
		{Vehicle Model Year},
		{Tire Volume},
		{Vehicle Sales Volume}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
Select3 derive({Tire Volume} = {Vehicle Sales Volume} * 2,
		{Vehicle Sales Volume} = {Vehicle Sales Volume} / 2,
		{Tire Position} = "Front") ~> front
ConditionalSplit2@Samefrontreartyre2 select(mapColumn(
		{Vehicle Sale Country},
		{Vehicle Source Country},
		{Vehicle Source Classification},
		{Markit code},
		MCODE,
		TCODE,
		{Vehicle Sales Parent},
		{Vehicle Macro Segment},
		{Vehicle Sub-segment},

DerivedColumn5, front, DerivedColumn2, DerivedColumn6 union(byName: true)~> Union2
Union2 derive({Timestamp of Data} = '26-11-2020',
		{Timestamp TimeZone} = 'EST',
		{Original Tire Load Index} = rtrim(ltrim({Tire Load Index})),
		{Tire Load Index} = trim(left(ltrim(rtrim(trim({Tire Load Index}, "N/K"))),3)),
		{Tire Size} = replace(replace({Tire Size}, " ", ""),"ZR","R"),
		{Tire Speed Rating} = iif((in([{Tire Speed Rating}], 'NA') || in([{Tire Speed Rating}], 'N/K') ) && (in([{Tire Prefix}], 'P') || in([{Tire Prefix}], 'LT') ||  in([{Tire Prefix}], '')), '0', {Tire Speed Rating}),
		{RMA Segment} = iif(in([{RMA Segment}], '6')|| in([{RMA Segment}], '7') || in([{RMA Segment}], '8')|| in([{RMA Segment}], '9'),'0'+ {RMA Segment},{RMA Segment})) ~> derived
derived, speed lookup({Tire Speed Rating} == Original_Speed_Rating,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1, sizecor lookup({Tire Size} == Original_Size,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup2
Lookup2 derive({Tire Size} = coalesce(Corrected_Size,Original_Size,{Tire Size}),
		{Tire Speed Rating} = coalesce(New_Speed_Rating,{Tire Speed Rating}),
		{Load Range} = case(right({Original Tire Load Index},3)=='STD','STD',right({Original Tire Load Index},2)=='XL','XL',in([right({Original Tire Load Index},1)], 'B')|| in([right({Original Tire Load Index},1)], 'C') || in([right({Original Tire Load Index},1)], 'D')|| in([right({Original Tire Load Index},1)], 'E')|| in([right({Original Tire Load Index},1)], 'F') || in([right({Original Tire Load Index},1)], 'G'),right({Original Tire Load Index},1),'tbd'),
		TIre_size_lookup = concat({Tire Prefix}, {Tire Size},' ',{Tire Load Index})) ~> DerivedColumn7
DerivedColumn7 split({Load Range}=='tbd',
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit3@(Loadrangetbd, otherstream)
ConditionalSplit3@Loadrangetbd, loadrange join(TIre_size_lookup == OE_Tire_Size,

parameters{
	p1 as integer (1)
}
source(output(
		{Original Size} as string,
		{Corrected Size} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		lkp_Original_Size as string,
		lkp_Corrected_Size as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select Original_Size as lkp_Original_Size ,\nCorrected_Size as lkp_Corrected_Size from dbo.tire_size_SCD',
	format: 'query') ~> source2
source1, source2 join({Original Size} == lkp_Original_Size,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 alterRow(insertIf(not(isNull({Original Size}))&&isNull(lkp_Original_Size)),
	updateIf(not(isNull({Original Size}))&&not(isNull(lkp_Original_Size))&&ltrim(rtrim(trim({Original Size})))==ltrim(rtrim(trim({lkp_Original_Size})))&&ltrim(rtrim(trim({Corrected Size})))!=ltrim(rtrim(trim(coalesce(lkp_Corrected_Size,'0')))))) ~> AlterRow1
ConditionalSplit1@Insert derive(create_date = currentTimestamp(),
		update_date = currentTimestamp(),
		change_ind = 'Y') ~> DerivedColumn1
AlterRow1 split(not(isNull({Original Size}))&&(isNull(lkp_Original_Size)),
	not(isNull({Original Size}))&&not(isNull(lkp_Original_Size))&&ltrim(rtrim(trim({Original Size})))==ltrim(rtrim(trim(lkp_Original_Size))),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Insert, Update, Other)
ConditionalSplit1@Update derive(update_date = currentTimestamp()) ~> DerivedColumn5
DerivedColumn5 select(mapColumn(
		{Original Size},
		{Corrected Size},
		Original_Size = lkp_Original_Size,
		update_date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		Sk_tire_size as integer,
		Original_Size as string,
		Corrected_Size as string,
		change_ind as string,
		create_date as timestamp,
		update_date as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['SET IDENTITY_INSERT dbo.tire_size_SCD OFF;'],
	postSQLs:['SET IDENTITY_INSERT dbo.tire_size_SCD ON;'],
	mapColumn(
		Original_Size = {Original Size},
		Corrected_Size = {Corrected Size},
		change_ind,
		create_date,
		update_date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
Select1 sink(input(
		Sk_tire_size as integer,
		Original_Size as string,
		Corrected_Size as string,
		change_ind as string,
		create_date as timestamp,
		update_date as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Original_Size'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Original_Size,
		Corrected_Size = {Corrected Size},
		update_date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 2,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink2

		update_date = currentTimestamp(),
		change_ind = 'Y') ~> DerivedColumn1

		change_ind
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
